author: bago
msg: trying to add maven 2 dependencies to fix m2 build.
ant is broken because a library (avalon-socket-library) cannot depend on another library (socket-shared-library). maybe we need a socket-api and then the 2 libraries should not depend on each other.

author: snoopdave
msg: Ensure that mediafile URLs always formed by call to URLStrategy, otherwise images/thumbnails may appear as broken on a "multisite" setup like I have with rollerweblogger.org and photophys.com running on same Roller instance.
